declaration.accept: I confirm that I will administer the estate of the person who died according to law, and that my application is truthful.
declaration.confirm: I confirm that we will administer the estate of DiedFN DiedLn, according to law. I will:
declaration.requests: If the probate registry (court) asks me to do so, I will:
declaration.confirmItem2: keep full details (an inventory) of the estate
declaration.confirmItem3: keep a full account of how the estate has been administered
declaration.requestsItem1: provide the full details of the estate and how it has been administered
declaration.requestsItem2: return the grant of probate to the court
declaration.submitWarning: Once you click ‘Save and continue’, you cannot change your answers.
declaration.understandItem1: my application will be rejected if I do not answer any questions about the information I have given
declaration.understandItem2: criminal proceedings for fraud may be brought against me if I am found to have been deliberately untruthful or dishonest

legalStatement.intro: This statement is based on the information you’ve given in your application. It will be stored as a public record.
legalStatement.deceased: DiedFN DiedLn was born on 1 January 1950 and died on 1 January 2017, domiciled in England and Wales.
legalStatement.applicant: I, Applicant First Name Applicant Last Name of test address, make the following statement:

executorsApplying.name: I, Applicant First Name Applicant Last Name, an executor named in the will or codicils as Bob Alias, am applying for probate. My name is different because: Because YOLO.
executorsApplying.sign: I will sign and send to the probate registry what I believe to be the true and original last will and testament and any codicils of DiedFN DiedLn.

legalStatement.deceasedEstateLand: To the best of my knowledge, information and belief, there was no land vested in DiedFN DiedLn which was settled previously to the death (and not by the will) of DiedFN DiedLn and which remained settled land notwithstanding such death.
legalStatement.deceasedOtherNames: They were also known as alias_firstnames_1 alias_lastnames_1 and alias_firstnames_2 alias_lastnames_2.
legalStatement.deceasedEstateValue: The gross value for the estate amounts to £600000 and the net value for the estate amounts to £300000.
